sudoku

Class SwingSudokuBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • sudoku.SudokuBoard
      • sudoku.SwingSudokuBoard

  • public class SwingSudokuBoard
extends SudokuBoard
    This class represents a graphical Sudoku board. It is mostly a two-dimensional JTextField array providing all the functionality of a SudokuBoard object. Board cells are identified by their row and column and are zero-indexed.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daniele Mazzocchio
